title: Kuo: USB-C AirPods and other Apple accessories coming alongside iPhone 15
content:
Reports from both Ming-Chi Kuo and Bloomberg over the last week have claimed that Apple could switch the iPhone from Lightning to USB-C for charging as soon as next year. Now, Kuo is doubling down further on this claim and said that Apple will also transition its other Lightning products, including AirPods, to USB-C on a similar timeline.

description: Alongside rumors of a USB-C iPhone coming in 2023, a new report says Apple is also planning to release USB-C AirPods for the first time.
